title: Font used in the home page banner of http://gb.burton.com
content:
Hi,

Can anyone help and identify this font. It has a really nice relaxed, cool feel about it, that is missing from a lot of hand drawn font.

Thanks in advance,

Chris

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724111920im_/http:/typophile.com/files/burton_5468.jpg)
author: burgboy

comments.content:
It looks handwritten - not a font  
(look at the 4 different /e's, 3 different /S's etc)
